data.title: Official blog of the Met Office news team
data.meta_description: 5 posts published by Met Office Press Office during August 2024
data.meta_site_name: Official blog of the Met Office news team
data.text:
The real world is neither black, nor white. It is made from shades of grey. The weather forecast can contain many possibilities, but forecasters usually try to distil it down to the most likely outcome. Why should a weather forecast try … Continue reading →

We have made major changes to the weather forecasts on our website and app. Although you may not have noticed anything different yet, we’ve undertaken a significant upgrade to the data system that generates our seven-day forecasts throughout the UK … Continue reading →

Today, the Met Office celebrates its 170th birthday. Since its very beginnings on 1 August 1854, the organisation has been a pioneer of weather and climate science, and it is now one of the leading forecasting and research centres in … Continue reading →

This is the official blog of the Met Office news team, intended to provide journalists and bloggers with the latest weather, climate science and business news and information from the Met Office.

The blog will post latest news releases and related content, news diary and information supporting news stories already in the media.
